snippet.title: Alan Wake 2 – Announcement Trailer | The Game Awards 2021
snippet.description:
Monsters wear many faces.



In Alan Wake 2, continue the writer’s story and experience Remedy Entertainment’s first foray into survival horror.

Coming to PC on the Epic Games Store, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S on October 27th 2023.

Presented by Epic Games Publishing.


#AlanWake

Follow Alan Wake:
Website: http://alanwake.com 
Twitter: http://twitter.com/alanwake 
Facebook: http://facebook.com/alanwake 
Instagram: http://instagram.com/alanwakeofficial 

Follow Remedy Entertainment:
Website: http://remedygames.com 
Twitter: http://twitter.com/remedygames 
Facebook: http://facebook.com/remedygames 
Instagram: http://instagram.com/remedygames 
Discord: http://discord.gg/remedygames
